    • Constructor Detail

      • Binary

        public Binary(String number)
        A constructor that generates a binary object.
        Parameters:
        number - a String of the binary values. It should conatins only zeros or ones with any length and order. otherwise, the value of "0" will be stored. Trailing zeros will be excluded and empty string will be considered as zero.

    • Method Detail

      • getValue

        public String getValue()
        Return the binary value of the variable
        Returns:

        public static Binary add(Binary num1,
                         Binary num2)
        Adding two binary variables. For more information, visit Add-Binary-Numbers .
        Parameters:
        num1 - The first addend object
        num2 - The second addend object
        Returns:
        A binary variable with a value of num1+num2.
